In the Kotlin language bindings core metrics are [initialized early](https://searchfox.org/glean/rev/fbe36bfe9758ac1ae8ac9047fb363b8e55db5cc5/glean-core/android/src/main/java/mozilla/telemetry/glean/Glean.kt#174) only if that's the first run, otherwise they are [initialized later](https://searchfox.org/glean/rev/fbe36bfe9758ac1ae8ac9047fb363b8e55db5cc5/glean-core/android/src/main/java/mozilla/telemetry/glean/Glean.kt#210). This allows the previously stored "application" lifetime metrics to be consistent within the generated pings (even custom ones!).

We need to make sure the behaviour matches with Kotlin/[Swift](https://searchfox.org/glean/rev/fbe36bfe9758ac1ae8ac9047fb363b8e55db5cc5/glean-core/ios/Glean/Glean.swift#111).
